p: More recently, novel parvoviruses belonging to the genera Bocaparvovirus and Protoparvovirus have been identified in cats [ 12, 14, 16, 17] ( Table 4), raising several questions on their possible association with clinical disease. Interestingly, these viruses have been detected either in the feline intestinal content but also in respiratory [ 12, 14], blood, urinary, and kidney samples [ 12].
